text: @morningmika @realDonaldTrump I’ll save my concern for front line and essential workers. Herman Cain had choices; wear a mask or even stay home but instead he decided to die on the hill of hubris. Covid19 is indifferent. Play stupid games, win stupid prizes. Spectacularly bad choice.
